lead_paragraph: Uruguay defender Alvaro Pereira's hopes of making his Getafe debut at Malaga in La Liga on Friday have been dashed by an eight-match ban imposed by the Argentine FA (AFA).

headline.print_headline: Argentine FA Bans Trio for Eight Games After Brawl
headline.main: Argentine FA Bans Trio for Eight Games After Brawl

snippet: Uruguay defender Alvaro Pereira's hopes of making his Getafe debut at Malaga in La Liga on Friday have been dashed by an eight-match ban imposed by the Argentine FA (AFA)....
